summary: Space encompasses various forms of organizations beyond natural environments, reflecting a shift in understanding human organizations as living systems transcending time and space. Modern usage in arts, society, and business reveals the need for intentional design for healthy development. It introduces ecosystem architecture, a multidisciplinary approach to creating thriving environments.
excerpt: Ecosystem now describes various forms of organizations beyond natural environments, reflecting a shift in understanding human organizations as living systems transcending time and space requiring design for development.
